title: SAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Sports Authority of India (SAI) has officially released the notification to fill 01 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil Engineering, can apply for the SAI Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee...
